name: Blue Dash: The ascent
description:
Blue Dash : The ascent is a first project developed with Godot engine.

It is a platform game where you control a character in some floors of a mysterious building. In each floor, you must look for the switches to unlock the lift which leads you to the next one. You have the ability of jumping, sliding or climbing on walls and dashing since you catch 'energy' items.

The time of each level is recorded and, in the endgame, you have the possibility to improve your score.

Blue Dash : The ascent is for the moment in the form of a demo and contain only few floors with different level of  difficulties. The project is still in development and the goal of this demo is to test the reliability of the game.

                                                                                                                  Paul.V & Erebos
